de.ityx.mediatrix.api.interfaces

Interface IEditorContainer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IEditor, IPopupExtender
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultCustomEditorContainer

    public interface IEditorContainer
extends IEditor, IPopupExtender
    Defines the text editor(e.g. for answers, subproject templates, service center mails)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int BUTTON_MARK_MBODY 
      static int E_TEXTOBJECT
      The type for the text object editor.

      • setType

        @Deprecated
void setType(int type)
        Deprecated. 
        This method has currently no effect and it's use should therefore be omitted. Sets a type for the editor. E.g. type=0 for Textobject (At moment only 0 for Textobject is possible)
        Parameters:
        type -
